name: 2021 the 4th International Conference on Energy, Electrical and Power Engineering（CEEPE 2021）
content: Publication： Papers will be submitted in the CEEPE Conference Proceedings, and reviewed by the IEEE Conference Publication Program for IEEE Xplore, Ei Compendex and Scopus, Thomson Reuters (WoS), Inspec,et al. Special issue： Selected registered & presented papers with extension will be recommended to be published in special issue: 1\. CSEE Journal of Power and Energy Systems. Indexed by the Science Citation Index Expanded (SCIE)，IEEE Xplore. Impact Factor：3.115 . 2\. Protection and Control of Modern Power Systems (PCMP). Indexed by the ESCI(Emerging Sources Citation Index)，Scopus, Google Scholar, DOAJ, EBSCO, Discovery Service, OCLC.
